description: Install and manage the certificate generated by the site https://www.sslforfree.com. Also creates the certificate in JKS format.

certs_dir.description: The path of the certificate directory

keystore_file.description: The full path of the keystore

cacerts_file.description: The full path of the cacerts

ca_cert.description: The CA (Certificate Authority) certificate file name

download_ca_cert.description: The full CA (Certificate Authority) certificate download URL

download_host_cert_key.description: The full private key download URL

download_host_cert_crt.description: The full Domain/Host certificate download URL

java_cacert.description: The full path of Java cacerts

keystore_pass.description: The kestore password. By default, it is match the parameter keystore_pass_default.
